dict.string: This app needs camera access to capture photos and videos for your game profile and share your achievements with friends.
This app needs microphone access to record audio for video content and enhance your gaming experience with voice features.
This app needs photo library access to save your game screenshots, achievements, and custom content to your device.
This app needs photo library access to let you select and use your own images as avatars or backgrounds in the game.
This app would like to track you across apps and websites to provide personalized gaming content and improve your experience.
